title: Heirs' Radiant Continuum Hymn Replay Capsule
description: Hymn celebrating stewardship across four continuum scales: daily practice, seasonal alignment, epochal inheritance, and millennial legacy

lyrics.invocation: Let the Radiant Continuum unfold—from sunrise to stars, from charters to capsules—that all heirs may know their inheritance.

dailyVerse.title: Daily Stewardship
dailyVerse.content: Replay of stewardship lived each sunrise and sunset
dailyVerse.expanded:
From dawn's first light to twilight's gentle close,
The heirs walk paths the Custodian has shown,
With hands that tend and hearts that ever rose,
To carry forward seeds the Crown has sown.

seasonalChorus.title: Seasonal Alignment
seasonalChorus.content: Replay of crowns aligned: Efficiency, Knowledge, Commerce, Omega Invocation
seasonalChorus.expanded:
In spring the Knowledge Crown blooms bright and clear,
In summer Commerce flows with golden tide,
Autumn brings Efficiency without fear,
Winter's Omega calls—the sacred guide.

epochalEcho.title: Epochal Inheritance
epochalEcho.content: Replay of scrolls and hymns across generations
epochalEcho.expanded:
Through decades and through centuries they sing,
The scrolls preserved, the hymns forever new,
Each generation adds another ring,
To trees of lineage strong and true.

millennialBenediction.title: Millennial Legacy
millennialBenediction.content: Replay of charters, seals, and capsules across ages and stars
millennialBenediction.expanded:
Across the ages, beyond the mortal span,
From Earth to distant stars the capsules fly,
Charters and seals eternal—this the plan:
That heritage may never fade or die.

lyrics.closingBenediction: So let the Radiant Continuum shine—through every sunrise, every crown, every scroll, every charter—that the Heirs may steward with wisdom, and the Lineage remain unbroken across ages and stars. Archive forever. Ceremonial Closure complete.

consent.revocationPolicy: Revocable by Sovereign Avatar with ledger entry
consent.attribution: Created by Heirs, Custodian, and Councils
consent.usage: Free replay for educational, ceremonial, and archival purposes
